header.title: Pattern Transformer
header.abstract: This document describes the pattern transformer of Cocoon.

s1.title: Pattern Transformer
s1.p: The pattern transformer recognizes special texts part using patterns, and replaces them with XML elements. This transformer use a lexicon file to specify the pattern.

ul.li: Cacheable: yes - uses the last modification date of the lexicon document for validation.

s1.p: The pattern transformer parses all text elements from the SAX stream, and replaces the special text parts.
The pattern transformer will replace these special text parts with a lexeme (token).
s1.source: <myelement> bla blah <lexeme xmlns="http://chaperon.sourceforge.net/schema/lexemes/1.0" symbol="Hello World" text="Hello World"/> bla </myelement>
s1.p: A detailed explanation of function and the lexicon format can be found at Chaperon.
